message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I take 60, you take 40.
I think it's fair to split the money more evenly. I'll take 55, you take 45. Let's get this done!
I understand you want a more even split, but time is running out and the value is decreasing. I'm sticking with my previous offer - it's a fair deal.
We're both losing money with each round. Let's be reasonable and split the money equally. 50/50 is the fairest solution.
